name: Farty Party Unicorns
description:
Ever had one of those dreams where you were a unicorn, flying through a magical land of cupcakes and rainbows? Well, this is a game largely based on such nonsense and the madness that only comes from the mind of an ADHD 5 y/o girl.

This pinball / billiards hybrid game challenges you to send a rotund unicorn around a randomly generated maze to eat all the cupcakes and rack up the points! The game is never the same twice and is effectively INFINITE!

This game is still in the early phases of development. Many more features to come!
